sentence.Network_en: The famine threatened to depopulate the continent.
sentence.Network_cn: 饥荒可能会导致该大洲人口剧减。

sentence.Network_en: King Ptolemy prohibited Hegesias from lecturing , lest he depopulate the country.
sentence.Network_cn: 国王托勒密因此禁止何基西亚斯讲课, 以避免其哲学使国家人口下降. )

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'ravage, lay waste'): from Latin depopulat- 'ravaged', from the verb depopulari, from de- 'completely' + populari 'lay waste' (from populus 'people')

entry.def: To depopulate an area means to greatly reduce the number of people living there.

example.ex: The famine threatened to depopulate the continent.
example.tran: 饥荒可能会导致该大洲人口剧减。

auth_sentence.content: The late Plague, which did much depopulate this Kingdom.
auth_sentence.res_content: The late Plague, which did much depopulate this Kingdom.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The late Plague, which did much depopulate this Kingdom.

auth_sentence.content: Where is this viper That would depopulate the city and Be every man himself?
auth_sentence.res_content: Where is this viper That would depopulate the city and Be every man himself?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Where is this viper That would depopulate the city and Be every man himself?

auth_sentence.content: Then, when we will be forced to depopulate, we may already know how to better forecast wind conditions.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then, when we will be forced to depopulate, we may already know how to better forecast wind conditions.

stems_affixes.word_buile: popul人民+ous……的→adj.人口稠密的;人口多的
popul人民[平民]+ace名词字尾→n.平民,大众
popular流行的+ity性质→n.大众性,通俗性
popularize大众化,推广+ation表名词→n.普及,推广,通俗化
popul人民+ation表名词→n.全体居民,人口

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使[某地]人口减少,减少人口
stems_affixes.word_buile: de去掉,除去+popul人民[人口],+ate使……→去掉人口
popular流行的+ize……化,使……→v.[使]大众化,[使]普及,推广

stems_affixes.value_cn: 使人民居住于…中,使人口集中在…之中,移民于…
stems_affixes.word_buile: popul人民+ate使……→v.使人民居住于…中,使人口集中在…之中,移民于…
re一再+populate使人民重新居住于…→v.使人民重新居住于…
